description: Verify that the home page loads correctly when accessing the root URL
scenario: User navigates to the home page by typing the URL and expecting to see all content sections
expected_results: Display the complete home page with hero section, features, learning modules, and CTA sections
procedure:
1. Open web browser
2. Navigate to `http://localhost:5000/`
3. Verify page loads completely
4. Check all sections are visible (Hero, Features, Learning Modules, CTA)

description: Verify authenticated user can navigate to levels overview from home page
scenario: Authenticated user clicks on learning buttons to continue their progress
expected_results: User is redirected to levels overview page when clicking 'Start Learning' or 'Continue Learning'
procedure:
1. Login as authenticated user
2. Navigate to home page
3. Click 'Start Learning' or 'Continue Learning' button
4. Verify redirection to levels overview

description: Verify unauthenticated user is directed to signup from home page
scenario: New user visits the site and wants to get started
expected_results: User is redirected to signup page when clicking 'Get Started'
procedure:
1. Ensure user is not logged in
2. Navigate to home page
3. Click 'Get Started' button
4. Verify redirection to signup page

description: Verify navigation to about page from home page
scenario: User wants to learn more about the platform before signing up
expected_results: User is redirected to about page when clicking 'Learn More'
procedure:
1. Navigate to home page
2. Click 'Learn More' button in hero section
3. Verify redirection to `/about` page
4. Confirm about page content loads

description: Verify dark mode functionality on home page
scenario: User toggles between light and dark themes
expected_results: Page theme changes to dark mode with appropriate color scheme
procedure:
1. Navigate to home page
2. Click dark mode toggle (if available)
3. Verify background changes to dark theme
4. Check text colors are readable in dark mode

description: Verify home page displays correctly on mobile devices
scenario: User accesses the site from a mobile device
expected_results: Page layout adapts to mobile screen with readable text and functional buttons
procedure:
1. Open browser developer tools
2. Set viewport to mobile size (375x667)
3. Navigate to home page
4. Verify responsive layout and button accessibility

description: Verify all learning module cards are displayed correctly
scenario: User scrolls down to explore available learning modules
expected_results: Six learning module cards displayed with icons, titles, and descriptions
procedure:
1. Navigate to home page
2. Scroll to 'Cybersecurity Game Scenarios' section
3. Verify all 6 cards are visible: Email Detective, Truth Seeker, Privacy Guardian, Vault Keeper, Cyber Fortress, White Hat Academy
4. Check icons and text are properly displayed

description: Verify features section displays correctly with animations
scenario: User explores the key features of the platform
expected_results: Three feature cards displayed with icons and hover effects
procedure:
1. Navigate to home page
2. Scroll to 'Learning Features' section
3. Verify three cards: Gamified Learning, AI Mentoring, Real Scenarios
4. Test hover effects on cards

description: Verify hero section loads with proper animations and floating elements
scenario: User lands on the home page and sees the main hero section
expected_results: Hero text fades in with staggered animation, floating cyber elements visible
procedure:
1. Navigate to home page
2. Observe hero section load
3. Verify 'Welcome to CyberQuest' text animates in
4. Check floating colored circles are animated

description: Verify CTA section shows signup and login options for unauthenticated users
scenario: New user reaches the bottom of the page and wants to take action
expected_results: 'Get Started' and 'Sign In' buttons displayed in CTA section
procedure:
1. Ensure user is logged out
2. Navigate to home page
3. Scroll to bottom CTA section
4. Verify 'Get Started' and 'Sign In' buttons are present
5. Test both button links

description: Verify CTA section shows continue learning option for authenticated users
scenario: Returning user scrolls to the bottom and wants to continue their journey
expected_results: 'Continue Learning' button displayed in CTA section for logged-in users
procedure:
1. Login as authenticated user
2. Navigate to home page
3. Scroll to bottom CTA section
4. Verify 'Continue Learning' button is present
5. Test button redirects to levels overview

description: Verify home page loads within acceptable time and resources
scenario: User accesses the site and expects fast loading times
expected_results: Page loads within 3 seconds and CSS/JS files load correctly
procedure:
1. Clear browser cache
2. Open browser developer tools Network tab
3. Navigate to home page
4. Verify page load time under 3 seconds
5. Check all CSS and JS files load successfully
